section.title: Backward compatibility summary
section.para: GT 4.2.0 includes a new stable release, GridWay 5.4.0, that ships with functionality additions focused in extending usability for the end users. The following information regards compatibility with the previous stable version included in GT 4.0.7:

listitem.simpara: Added DRMAA scripting language bindings for Python, Ruby and Perl.
Added gwdag, a tool to run Condor DAGMAN compatible workflows.
